title: Christina Applegate Wins an Honorary Emmy for Most Savage Red-Carpet Interviews
text:
Christina Applegate didn’t have to murder Giuliana Rancic like this #Emmys pic.twitter.com/bg9z6ObPEn — Ira thee Third (@ira) September 22, 2019

While you were too busy worshipping Gwendoline Christie’s Jesus gown or anything related to the Hot Priest, you may have missed the true VIP floating around the Emmys red carpet last night: A radiantly savage Christina Applegate, who, in honey badger form, didn’t give a shit about any of the softball questions flung at her by E!’s Giuliana Rancic and Fox’s Jenny McCarthy. Especially when those softball questions didn’t pass a basic level of fact-checking. Or when those softball questions came from a network her family never watches. Just anticipate her reactions. Dead to Me indeed.
description: Christina Applegate shaded Giuliana Rancic and Jenny McCarthy on the Emmys red carpet, for different reasons.
